page.title: 11LIFE ON SUNDAY
page.content: Most Sundays I get up at about {7.30am because my sister Gemma always wakes me up.When we come down stairs for breakfast mum sometimes tells us where we will be going during the day.Most Sundays my Mum takes us to see our nan who lives at {NOWETH PLACE},we get there at about {10'o'clock}.As soon as we get there my nan gives us a drink and something to eat.When we finish our drink and food my nan takes me into the front room and I try to finish my tapestry book mark while my sister plays with her dolls.When we go home mum sometimes lets us go to the beach.We get our swimming costumes ready,food and other things that we need then we set of.When we get there first thing I do is run in to the water and have splash about with my brother.
